response.original_title: Hey Girl, Teach Me How to Ollie
response.overview: Amazing film about female skateboarders and their lack of identity in a world that glorifies male skateboarders. This leaves a few brave souls to cross over and do the skating from a girl's exciting times paving the way. Don't miss this short documentary about the rare people that exude bravery and make us sympathetic to their passion for skating.See it on www.montageplay.com
response.tagline: A fun and light hearted short film about the effects of internet and people in a cafe's reliance on WiFi.
response.title: Hey Girl, Teach Me How to Ollie
